title: Texas Declares Disaster as Season’s Biggest Storm Approaches
description: Texas Governor Greg Abbott issued disaster declarations for more than half the counties in the state ahead of a powerful winter storm. Bloomberg's Lauren Rosenthal explains. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Texas Governor Greg Abbott issued disaster declarations for more than half the counties in the state ahead of a powerful winter storm. Bloomberg's Lauren Rosenthal explains. (Source: Bloomberg)
